page.title: 01Introduction
page.content: This block covers part of a rural area much of which is low lying and is Known as The Weald Moors,and includes the village of Kynnersley in North Shropshire. The area is mainly agricultural,arable farming predominating. There no major manufacturing industries within the area. There are few public facilities,the nearest being Wellington,Telford or Newport. There are no major roads within the area and few public transport services. Settlements tend to be small,often little more than hamlets and are often nucleated.
